raw_text: For instance, work on word sense disambiguation i corpora (e.g. Resnik 1995), could lead to an estimate of frequencies for word senses in general, with rule-derived senses simply being a special case
clean_text: For instance, work on word sense disambiguation i corpora (e.g. Resnik 1995), could lead to an estimate of frequencies for word senses in general, with rule-derived senses simply being a special case.

citing_paper_authors: Pierpaolo, Basile | Marco, de Gemmis | Anna Lisa, Gentile | Pasquale, Lops | Giovanni, Semeraro
raw_text: An adaptation of Lesk dictionary-based WSD algorithm has been used to disambiguate adjectives and ad verbs (Banerjee and Pedersen, 2002), an adaptation of the Resnik algorithm has been used to disambiguate nouns (Resnik, 1995), while the algorithm we developed for disambiguating verbs exploits the nouns in the context of the verb as well as the nouns both in the glosses and in the phrases that WordNet utilizes to describe the usage of a verb
clean_text: An adaptation of Lesk dictionary-based WSD algorithm has been used to disambiguate adjectives and ad verbs (Banerjee and Pedersen, 2002), an adaptation of the Resnik algorithm has been used to disambiguate nouns (Resnik, 1995), while the algorithm we developed for disambiguating verbs exploits the nouns in the context of the verb as well as the nouns both in the glosses and in the phrases that WordNet utilizes to describe the usage of a verb.

citing_paper_authors: Pierpaolo, Basile | Marco, de Gemmis | Anna Lisa, Gentile | Pasquale, Lops | Giovanni, Semeraro
raw_text: nouns The procedure is obtained by making some variations to the algorithm designed by Resnik (1995) for disambiguating noun groups
clean_text: The procedure is obtained by making some variations to the algorithm designed by Resnik (1995) for disambiguating noun groups.

citing_paper_authors: Pierpaolo, Basile | Marco, de Gemmis | Anna Lisa, Gentile | Pasquale, Lops | Giovanni, Semeraro
raw_text: JIGSAW nouns differs from the original algorithm by Resnik (1995) in the similarity measure used to compute relatedness of two senses
clean_text: JIGSAW nouns differs from the original algorithm by Resnik (1995) in the similarity measure used to compute relatedness of two senses.

raw_text: Although the assessment of semantic similarity using a dictionary database as knowledge source has been recognized as providing significant cues for word clustering (Resnik 1995b) and the determination of lexical cohesion (Morris& amp; Hirst, 1991), its relevance for word disambiguation in running text remains relatively unexplored
clean_text: Although the assessment of semantic similarity using a dictionary database as knowledge source has been recognized as providing significant cues for word clustering (Resnik 1995b) and the determination of lexical cohesion (Morris& amp; Hirst, 1991), its relevance for word disambiguation in running text remains relatively unexplored.

raw_text: Resnik (1995a) defines the semantic similarity between two words as the entropy value of the most informative concept subsuming the two words in a hierarchically structured thesaurus
clean_text: Resnik (1995a) defines the semantic similarity between two words as the entropy value of the most informative concept subsuming the two words in a hierarchically structured thesaurus.

raw_text: At present, we are trying to integrate the word sense disambiguation method proposed in (Resnik, 1995) into our system
clean_text: At present, we are trying to integrate the word sense disambiguation method proposed in (Resnik, 1995) into our system.

raw_text: Semantic tags are assigned from on-line thesaura like WordNet (Basili et al 1996) (Resnik, 1995), Roget ' s categories (Yarowsky 1992) (Chen and Chen, 1996), the Japanese BGH (Utsuro et al 1993), or assigned manually (Basili et al 1992) 1
clean_text: Semantic tags are assigned from on-line thesaura like WordNet (Basili et al 1996) (Resnik, 1995), Roget's categories (Yarowsky 1992) (Chen and Chen, 1996), the Japanese BGH (Utsuro et al 1993), or assigned manually (Basili et al 1992).

raw_text: Finally, disambiguating the direct object according to WordNet categories ,e.g., Resnik (1995), would improve the accuracy of using these categories to disambiguate verbs
clean_text: Finally, disambiguating the direct object according to WordNet categories, e.g., Resnik (1995), would improve the accuracy of using these categories to disambiguate verbs.

raw_text: There have been a number of attempts to combine paradigmatic and syntagmatic similarity strategies (e.g., Hearst and Grefenstette 1992, Resnik 1995)
clean_text: There have been a number of attempts to combine paradigmatic and syntagmatic similarity strategies (e.g., Hearst and Grefenstette 1992, Resnik 1995).

raw_text: Eventually, the sense supported by those patterns which are semantically closer to the context in question is selected as the most likely one (see, among others, [Dolan, 1994], [Resnik, 1995a, 1995b], [Agirre and Rigau, 1996], [Sanfilippo, 1997])
